title: Complaints Tracking - Chatbot
description: The customer care team is tracking (and self-testing) the complaints-per-hour (cpm) of experitmental chatbot such as unhelpful or rude behavior. Try to keep it down under 200 cpm.

title: Cart Abandoned - Checkout Process
description: The sales team is tracking the checkout failure rate in terms of checkout-abandons-per-hour (chph) after reaching the cart page. Historical analysis has set a toleration of up to 100 per hour.

title: Cart Abandoned - Never Visited
description: The sales team is tracking the failure rate to reach the cart page after adding products to it as cart-abandons-per-hour (caph). Historical analysis has calculated a limit of up to 500 caph as normal behavior.

title: Order Cancels - Out-of-Stock
description: The fulfilment team is tracking the order-cancellations-per-minute (ocpm) due to multiple people ordering same low-stocked item at same time. This leads to a race condition. We can't afford it above 50 due to customer anger.
